mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia / et / Florida [verso]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Amsterdam; Note: image depicts back; see "Related Item" field for front of image. A reduced verson of Hondius' Virginiae Item et Floridae (Spalding 20) and based on John White and Jacque Le Moyne, this small map appeared in Atlas Minor Gerardi Mercatoris a I. Hondio ... auctus. Relief is shown pictorially and the map shows Indian villages. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mercator, Gerhard, 1512-1594. Atlas Europae. English
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Maps
Maps--Early works to 1800
Cartographic materials
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection
